content.rendered:
Here are some auditory listening programs that can be done at home on the computer. Mention of these products does not imply HLAA endorsement nor does exclusion of any other products imply disapproval.

Angel Sound
http://angelsound.tigerspeech.com

Customized Learning Exercises for Aural Rehab
https://www.clearworks4ears.com

LACE (Listening and Communication Enhancement): Therapy for the Brain
https://laceauditorytraining.com

Postit Science: Brain Fitness Program
 PositScience.com

Listening Programs for Cochlear Implants

Advanced Bionics
thelisteningroom.com

Cochlear Americas
hope.cochlearamericas.com/listening-tools/self-auditory-rehabilitation-web-sites

MED-EL 
medel.com/us/max-listening-and-com-auditory-rehabilitation
